ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, to lower the amount of data Heritirx fetches I thought about using Accept-encoding: gzip in the Accept-Headers. Unfortunatly it seems to me like

Hi everyone,

to lower the amount of data Heritirx fetches I thought about =
using
"Accept-encoding: gzip" in the Accept-Headers.
Unfortunatly it seems =
to me like Heritrix isn't decoding the received
data at all - thus fails to=
 extract any links from the received
document  (and saves gzip'd data into =
the ARC file)

I have basically two question:
a) would you recommend using =
this feature at all?
b) is my observation correct (about Heritrix not yet r=
eally supporting
it)?

Thanks in advance for any ideas/opinions.
  Olaf Fre=
yer
